title: Future-Oriented Reflective Learning for Developing Instructional Design Expert Identity

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Instructional Design Theory and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Advanced Instructional Design Specialization Course for Corporate Training Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core job competencies and role models in instructional design
Learners reflect on and document their professional development directions across dimensions of growth (becoming), practice (being), and will (willing)
Learners implement an ideal professional identity for instructional designers suited to corporate education environments in portfolio format
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
